original_text: Then God’s temple in heaven was opened, and within his temple was seen the ark of his covenant. And there came flashes of lightning, rumblings, peals of thunder, an earthquake and a severe hailstorm.
korean_text: 이에 하늘에 있는 하나님의 성전이 열리니 성전 안에 하나님의 언약궤가 보이며 또 번개와 음성들과 우레와 지진과 큰 우박이 있더라

sentences.original_text: Then God's temple in heaven was opened
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 하늘에 있는 하나님의 성전이 열렸고

sentences.original_text: and within his temple was seen the ark of his covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 성전 안에서 그의 언약궤가 보였습니다

sentences.original_text: And there came flashes of lightning
an earthquake and a severe hailstorm
